DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Protocol Addendum Activation Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether or not the appendage to the trial protocol containing supplemental information has been activated.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the trial, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents._An appendage to an existing document that contains supplemental information. The parent document remains content is unaltered._To cause something to start or to stimulate activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the trial, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.:An appendage to an existing document that contains supplemental information. The parent document remains content is unaltered.

Concepts.definition: A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the study, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.
An appendage to an existing document that contains supplemental information. The parent document remains content is unaltered.

Property.preferredDefinition: To cause something to start; stimulation of activity.

Concepts.definition: To cause something to start or to stimulate activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
